code: import*as actionTypes from'./actionTypes';export var getBooks=function getBooks(books){return{type:actionTypes.GET_BOOKS,books:books};};export var removeBook=function removeBook(book){return{type:actionTypes.REMOVE_BOOK,book:book};};export var addBook=function addBook(book){return{type:actionTypes.ADD_BOOK,book:book};};export var setBookFilter=function setBookFilter(filter){return{type:actionTypes.SET_BOOK_FILTER,filter:filter};};
